channel.title: Go on Abhishek Hodavdekar
channel.description: Recent content in Go on Abhishek Hodavdekar

item.title: Learning a new language
item.description: Learning Go has always been on my todo list for a few years. It has been gaining in popularity recently and is one of the top languages developers want to learn in 2020. Or maybe the Go song inspired me ðŸ˜† I started with the Tour of GO to learn the basic syntax and data structures. Its a great learning resource with a few exercises thrown in. My main motive was to learn about Concurrency in GO, which is where GO seems to score with developers.
